attribute.name: pre_installation
attribute.value: cd $SRCDIR;git remote add dce git://github.com/direct-code-execution/net-next-sim.git; git fetch dce; git merge dce/sim-ns3-3.5.0-branch; echo 'CONFIG_MPTCP=y' >> arch/sim/defconfig; sed 's/CONFIG_SYN_COOKIES=y/\#CONFIG_SYN_COOKIES=y/' arch/sim/defconfig >a; mv a arch/sim/defconfig

attribute.name: post_installation
attribute.value: mkdir -p $INSTALLDIR/bin_dce; cd $INSTALLDIR/bin_dce; cp $SRCDIR/libsim-linux3.5.7.so ./libsim-linux3.5.7-mptcp.so; ln -s -f libsim-linux3.5.7-mptcp.so liblinux.so

attribute.name: pre_installation

attribute.name: post_installation

attribute.name: pre_installation
attribute.value: mkdir -p $INSTALLDIR/lib; cd $SRCDIR; rm -rf issue-106.patch; echo 'diff --git a/pygccxml/declarations/calldef.py b/pygccxml/declarations/calldef.py' >> issue-106.patch; echo '--- a/pygccxml/declarations/calldef.py' >> issue-106.patch; echo '+++ b/pygccxml/declarations/calldef.py' >> issue-106.patch; echo '@@ -85,6 +85,12 @@ class argument_t(object):' >> issue-106.patch; echo ' def __lt__(self, other):' >> issue-106.patch; echo ' if not isinstance(other, self.__class__):' >> issue-106.patch; echo ' return self.__class__.__name__ < other.__class__.__name__' >> issue-106.patch; echo '+ # See https://github.com/gccxml/pygccxml/issues/106' >> issue-106.patch; echo '+ if other.default_value == None:' >> issue-106.patch; echo '+ return False' >> issue-106.patch; echo '+ if self.default_value == None:' >> issue-106.patch; echo '+ return self.name < other.name \' >> issue-106.patch; echo '+ and self.decl_type < other.decl_type' >> issue-106.patch; echo ' return self.name < other.name \' >> issue-106.patch; echo ' and self.default_value < other.default_value \' >> issue-106.patch; echo ' and self.decl_type < other.decl_type' >> issue-106.patch; patch -p1 -i issue-106.patch
